cuttingActions.cut-tooltip: Split the segment at the current timeline marker position. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}
cuttingActions.cut-tooltip-aria: Cut. Split the segment at the current timeline marker position. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}.
cuttingActions.delete-restore-tooltip: Mark or unmark the segment at the current position as to be deleted. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}
cuttingActions.delete-restore-tooltip-aria: Delete and Restore. Mark or unmark the segment at the current position as to be deleted. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}.
cuttingActions.merge-all-tooltip: Combine all segments into a single segment.
cuttingActions.merge-all-tooltip-aria: Merge All. Combine all segments into a single segment.
cuttingActions.mergeLeft-tooltip: Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its left. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}
cuttingActions.mergeLeft-tooltip-aria: Merge Left. Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its left. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}.
cuttingActions.mergeRight-tooltip: Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its right. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}
cuttingActions.mergeRight-tooltip-aria: Merge Right. Combine the currently active segment with the segment to its right. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}.

video.previewButton-tooltip: Skips deleted segments when playing the video. Currently {{status}}. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}
video.previewButton-aria: Enable or disable preview mode. Hotkey: {{hotkeyName}}.
video.volumeSlider-aria: Adjust the volume level of the video.
video.comError-text: A problem occurred during communication with Opencast.
video.loadError-text: An error has occurred loading this video.
video.durationError-text: Opencast failed to provide the video duration.

save.info-text: The video will not be processed but all cutting information will be stored in Opencast. You can continue your edit later.
save.success-text: Changes saved successfully! You can now close the editor or continue working.

discard.info-text: Are you sure you want to discard your changes? This cannot be undone!

theEnd.discarded-text: Your changes have been discarded. You can now close the editor.
theEnd.startOver-tooltip: Reload the page to start over
theEnd.info-text: Changes successfully saved to Opencast. Processing your changes may take quite some time so please be patient. You can now close the editor.

workflowSelection.noWorkflows-text: There are no workflows to process your changes with. Please save your changes and contact an administrator.
workflowSelection.oneWorkflow-text: The video will be cut and processed with the workflow "{{workflow}}". <3/> This will take some time.
workflowSelection.manyWorkflows-text: Select which workflow Opencast should use for processing.

timeline.scrubber-text-aria: Timeline marker. {{currentTime}}. Active segment: {{segment}}. {{segmentStatus}}. Controls: {{moveLeft}} and {{moveRight}} to move the timeline marker. {{increase}} and {{decrease}} to increase/decrease the move delta.

metadata.submit-helpertext:
Make changes as you like, then hit the {{buttonName}} button.
Note that you will still have to start processing for your changes to take effect.

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail Editor
thumbnail.buttonGenerate-tooltip: Generate a new thumbnail from the current timeline marker position
thumbnail.buttonGenerate-tooltip-aria: Generate a new thumbnail from the current timeline marker position
thumbnail.buttonUseForOtherThumbnails-tooltip: Use the thumbnail for all tracks
thumbnail.buttonUseForOtherThumbnails-tooltip-aria: Use the thumbnail for all tracks
thumbnail.buttonDiscard-tooltip: Discard the thumbnail for this track
thumbnail.buttonDiscard-tooltip-aria: Discard the thumbnail for this track
thumbnail.buttonGenerateAll-tooltip: Generate new thumbnails for all tracks from the current timeline marker position
thumbnail.buttonGenerateAll-tooltip-aria: Generate new thumbnails for all tracks from the current timeline marker position
thumbnail.explanation: Upload or generate a thumbnail for each track.

error.workflowActive-errorMessage: This event is being processed. Please wait until the process is finished.

landing.contact-admin: If you were trying to edit a specific video but are seeing this page, please contact your administrator.
landing.start-editing-1: To start editing, specify the parameter
landing.start-editing-2: with the media package id of the video you wish to edit.
landing.link-to-documentation: More information about configuring the video editor is available in the administration guide at

various.error-text: An error has occurred. Please wait a bit and try again.

trackSelection.title: Select track(s) for processing
trackSelection.deleteTrackTooltip: Do not encode and publish this track.
trackSelection.cannotDeleteTrackTooltip: Cannot remove this track from publication.

subtitles.createSubtitleButton-tooltip: Opens a dialog for creating new subtitles
subtitles.createSubtitleButton-clicked-tooltip-ari: Contains a dialog for creating new subtitles
subtitles.createSubtitleButton-createButton-toolti: Start a new subtitle file with the chosen title.
subtitles.createSubtitleButton-createButton-disabl: Please pick a language from the dropdown above.
